about.title: About Me
about.description: Computer Engineering graduate specializing in Embedded Systems and Robotics
content: Hello! I'm Amr Eslim, a Computer Engineering graduate based in Berlin, Germany.
I completed my Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering at HTW Berlin (April 2025) with a focus on embedded systems.
My expertise lies in embedded systems with Linux, software development, and web application development.
I have hands-on experience as a software development working student at Fraunhofer IPK since May 2022, where I work on cutting-edge digital assistance systems for Industry 4.0.

My recent Bachelor's thesis on neurobiologically-inspired snake robotics demonstrates my ability to bridge biological principles with engineering solutions, combining CPG control algorithms, embedded programming, and mechanical design.
With a strong background in C/C++, Python, Rust, and embedded systems, I build reliable and efficient solutions for complex technical challenges.
I'm particularly interested in developing robotics systems that can seamlessly integrate with digital assistance systems and contribute to the future of automation.
Let's build the future of robotics and embedded systems together!

snake_robot.title: Neurobiologically-Inspired Snake Robot
snake_robot.subtitle: Bachelor Thesis – HTW Berlin (2025)
snake_robot.description: Bachelor's thesis project presenting the design, implementation, and experimental evaluation of a modular snake-like robot inspired by biological snake locomotion. Developed a complete biomimetic system reproducing lateral undulation and sidewinding using Central Pattern Generator (CPG) control algorithms. The project successfully integrated mechanical engineering, embedded systems programming, and neuroscience principles into a functional bio-inspired robotic platform.
features: ✅ **Modular Mechanical Design**: CAD-designed in Onshape and 3D-printed using PETG, PLA+, and TPU materials. Features 10 servo motors in alternating horizontal/vertical configuration (7H/3V) enabling complex undulatory motion patterns.

✅ **CPG Control Implementation**: Implemented mathematical Central Pattern Generator algorithms on ESP32 microcontroller using Arduino IDE. Generated synchronized sinusoidal waves with configurable parameters (amplitude: 10-45°, frequency: 0.1-2.0 Hz, phase offset: 30-90°) to achieve biomimetic locomotion.

✅ **Dual Locomotion Patterns**: Successfully implemented both lateral undulation (snake-like horizontal waves) and sidewinding (3D desert-style motion) with real-time switching capability through web interface.

✅ **ESP32-Based Control System**: Complete embedded system with WiFi access point, web server, and real-time control interface. Supports remote parameter tuning, motion pattern selection, and live system monitoring.

✅ **Power Management & Monitoring**: Integrated ACS712 current sensor for real-time power consumption analysis. Discovered sidewinding consumes ~50% more power than lateral undulation, with detailed energy profiling across all configurations.

✅ **Experimental Validation**: Comprehensive testing using Kinovea motion tracking software on structured grid environment. Quantitative analysis of motion patterns, velocity profiles, and energy consumption across different mechanical configurations.

✅ **Three Test Configurations**: Baseline robot, TPU-scale enhanced version (biomimetic friction), and PLA+ wheel configuration. Comparative analysis showed wheels provided most consistent linear progression.

✅ **Research Documentation**: Complete bachelor's thesis documentation including literature review, mathematical modeling, experimental methodology, and statistical analysis of results with performance comparisons.
✅ **Future Research Applications**: Thesis proposes ESP-NOW wireless control, swarm robotics applications, autonomous navigation using IMUs, and soft-body actuation for enhanced terrain adaptation.

cryptify.title: Cryptify - Secure Password Manager
cryptify.subtitle: Cross-Platform Security Application
cryptify.description: A comprehensive cross-platform password manager built with Rust backend and modern frontend technologies. Cryptify provides end-to-end encrypted password storage with zero-knowledge architecture, ensuring that the server never sees unencrypted user data. Features secure synchronization across web, desktop, and mobile platforms with AES-256-GCM encryption and Argon2id key derivation.
features: ✅ **Zero-Knowledge Architecture**: Complete end-to-end encryption where the server never sees plaintext passwords or sensitive data, ensuring user privacy and security.
✅ **Rust Backend with Actix-web**: High-performance, memory-safe backend built with Rust featuring JWT authentication, SQLx for type-safe database queries, and comprehensive API endpoints.
✅ **Modern Cryptography**: Implements AES-256-GCM for authenticated encryption and Argon2id for secure password-based key derivation, following current security best practices.
✅ **Cross-Platform Frontend**: React/TypeScript web application with Vite, Tailwind CSS, and modern development tools. Planned Tauri desktop and React Native mobile apps.
✅ **Secure Password Generation**: Cryptographically secure random password generator with customizable criteria including length, character sets, and exclusion rules.
✅ **Docker Containerization**: Complete containerized deployment ready for TrueNAS Scale with Docker Compose configuration for easy self-hosting.
✅ **Comprehensive Testing Strategy**: Test-driven development approach with contract tests, integration tests, and security validation following industry best practices.
✅ **Development Documentation**: Extensive technical specifications, API contracts, implementation plans, and user guides with clear setup instructions.

sidequester.title: SideQuester - IoT E-Compass
sidequester.subtitle: LoRa-based Friend Finder Device
sidequester.description: An innovative dual ESP32-based compass system designed for festivals and off-grid adventures where cellular networks fail. SideQuester uses GPS coordinates transmitted via LoRa radio technology to create a compass that always points toward your companion. Each device acts as both transmitter and receiver, providing real-time directional guidance with OLED display showing distance, direction, and connection status.
features: ✅ **Long-Range LoRa Communication**: Up to 3km range using LoRa radio technology (868MHz EU / 915MHz US) with proper frequency compliance and regional configuration support.
✅ **Precision GPS Navigation**: Integrated GPS module with Haversine formula calculations for accurate distance and bearing computation between devices, including compass calibration.
✅ **Real-Time Direction Display**: OLED screen showing intuitive compass interface with arrow indicators, distance measurements, and device status information.
✅ **ESP32-Based Architecture**: Dual ESP32 development boards with comprehensive sensor integration including HMC5883L digital compass and GPS modules.
✅ **Battery-Optimized Design**: Power management with deep sleep modes, battery voltage monitoring, and emergency SOS functionality for extended outdoor use.
✅ **Safety and Compliance**: Comprehensive documentation covering radio regulations, battery safety, environmental considerations, and emergency protocols.
✅ **Open Source Hardware**: Complete build documentation with component lists, wiring diagrams, software setup guides, and troubleshooting resources.
✅ **Community-Driven Development**: Active GitHub project with contribution guidelines, testing procedures, and collaborative development framework.

cv_portfolio.title: Interactive CV Portfolio

The site showcases professional experience, technical skills, and projects with an engaging user interface. Hosted on GitHub Pages with automatic deployment and mobile-responsive design.

✅ **Responsive Design**: Mobile-first responsive design ensuring optimal viewing experience across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices with smooth transitions and animations.
✅ **Multilingual Support**: Complete internationalization (i18n) implementation supporting English and German languages with seamless language switching functionality.
✅ **Interactive Components**: Dynamic project showcase, animated skill bars, interactive timeline for experience, and smooth scrolling navigation with section highlighting.
✅ **Performance Optimized**: Lazy loading, optimized images, efficient component rendering, and fast loading times with modern build tools and optimization techniques.
✅ **GitHub Pages Deployment**: Automated CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions for seamless deployment, custom domain support, and version control integration.
✅ **SEO and Accessibility**: Proper meta tags, semantic HTML, ARIA labels, and accessibility features ensuring good search engine visibility and inclusive design.
✅ **Professional Presentation**: Clean, modern design showcasing technical skills, project portfolios, experience timeline, and contact information in an engaging format.

opencv_auto.title: OpenCV Auto Projekt
opencv_auto.subtitle: Computer Vision Application
opencv_auto.description: A computer vision application built with Python and OpenCV for automated object detection and tracking. The project demonstrates practical applications of computer vision algorithms including real-time object detection, motion tracking, and image processing techniques. Designed for educational purposes and practical implementation of computer vision concepts in automotive or surveillance contexts.
features: ✅ **Real-Time Object Detection**: Implementation of computer vision algorithms for detecting and classifying objects in live video streams using OpenCV libraries.
✅ **Motion Tracking**: Advanced tracking algorithms for following moving objects across video frames with persistence and accuracy measurements.
✅ **Python-Based Implementation**: Clean, modular Python codebase utilizing OpenCV, NumPy, and other computer vision libraries for image processing and analysis.
✅ **Multiple Detection Methods**: Support for various object detection techniques including contour detection, template matching, and feature-based detection algorithms.
✅ **Educational Focus**: Well-documented code with clear examples and explanations suitable for learning computer vision concepts and practical implementation.
✅ **Configurable Parameters**: Adjustable detection sensitivity, tracking parameters, and processing options for different use cases and environments.
✅ **Performance Optimization**: Efficient algorithms and processing techniques for real-time performance with minimal computational overhead.
✅ **Practical Applications**: Designed for potential automotive applications, surveillance systems, or general object detection and tracking scenarios.
